page.title: 12CLUBS * EVENTS
page.content:
{CLUBS} There is a tennis club in Firle and every year they have a sponsered cycle ride to raise money for the club. There is also a cricket clubin the summer season.The Firle Recorder Workshop meets regularly in the village hall.The Womens Institute also has a branch in the village.
{EVENTS The pictures in the gallery at Firle Place record events from 1981-1985. Several were painted by Frank Singleton.Local events are recorded in local newspapers. In the newspapers the headlines are usually bad news. There are things like murders. Inside the papers there is some good news.
